segments.text: I see the water streaming down the cabinets, and it’s making me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The wood is going to warp and stain if this keeps up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing, and it’s only a matter of time before someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are making it worse by not paying attention to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t stand seeing things get ruined like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is even dripping onto the dishes on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a waste, and it’s making me upset.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone fixes this soon before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
